description: A production-ready multi-tenant SaaS application that allows organizations to manage projects and tasks with strict tenant isolation, role-based access control, and automated database initialization using Docker.
features: Multi-tenant architecture with strict data isolation
Role-based access control (Super Admin, Tenant Admin, User)
Project and task management per tenant
Task status and priority management using enums
Automatic database migrations and seed data
Health check endpoint for service readiness
notes: All services start using a single command: docker-compose up -d. Database migrations and seed data are executed automatically without any manual intervention.
